refnamediv.refpurpose: Prepare shotline and burst point library inputs for PDAM.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: burst uses LIBRT raytracing to prepare inputs to the Point Burst Damage Assessment Model (PDAM) in the form of shotline files and burst point library files.

listitem.para: Runs burst in batch mode, reading commands from an input file.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
